channel.title: Will you add these features?
channel.description:
> Will there be achievements in multiplayer? [b]Fun, cool achievements?[/b] [u]And some challenging[/u] / [u]difficult ones to get[/u]? [img]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/wcf/images/smilies/biggrin.png[/img]
> What about multiplayer character gibbing? Will you be able to make the player bodies into pieces, like in singleplayer? [u]and grab them[/u] and paint the walls with their blood? [img]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/wcf/images/smilies/biggrin.png[/img]
> Will Gordon be available as playermodel? (I mean his face) [u]Please, this is a must-have[/u]!
Thank you in advance.

item.title: Will you add these features?
item.dc:creator: Joe_chief
item.description:
I hope they include kleiner and Eli as well, I would love to kick ass as young kleiner

Read full topic

item.title: Will you add these features?
item.dc:creator: Myth_Alex
item.description:
Will there be achievements in multiplayer? Fun, cool achievements? And some challenging / difficult ones to get?

What about multiplayer character gibbing? Will you be able to make the player bodies into pieces, like in singleplayer? and grab them and paint the walls with their blood?

Will Gordon be available as playermodel? (I mean his face) Please, this is a must-have!

Thank you in advance.

Read full topic
